entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then freezing rain or rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
